descriptionHtml:
[img]http://i.imgur.com/yWSmE.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/MaPg7.jpg[/img]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/txubd.jpg[/img]
Crimson Ranger Armor is designed for Archers who able to take down most foes before they have a chance to draw sword.They are fighters specializing in long-range combat and rapid movement. Opponents are kept at distance by ranged weapons and swift maneuver, and engaged in melee with sword after the enemy is wounded and weary. The Armor itself consists of Archer's Cuirass, Archer's Cap, Archer's Gauntlets and Archer's Boots which are designed to be light and protective.
The Armor allows the Archer to make swift and deadly moves.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/IJkYw.jpg[/img]
Update 2: Added new textures, just download and extract to Data folder.
Update: Make sure you download the FIX.
Completely new forgeable stand-alone ranger armor set. Includes custom Cloak, Cuirass, Guantlets, Boots.
Highly detailed yet fitting Skyrim's enviroment & lore. This a completely new stand alone armor set designed for Males and Females which should not conflict nor replace anything.
Note: This is my first Armor Mod so please be kind. I will consider any Suggestions and Improvements.
[URL=http://www.p3d.in/ageY8]Here[/URL] you can take a look at the Model.[img]http://i.imgur.com/cy2mT.jpg[/img]
[youtube]hHkj3McE83U[/youtube] [youtube]laN6IHPIUJk[/youtube] [youtube]w6NS_GidIK0[/youtube] [youtube]lYedSOUNjTw[/youtube]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/B5gYo.jpg[/img]
If you wish to use this armor set for your mod, please ask me by message first.
Do not upload the content of this mod anywhere without asking me first.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/k2ov6.jpg[/img]
The Armor can be crafted at any forge, this are the materials that are required to craft The Armor:
Archer's Boots : 2 Leather, 2 Leather Strips, 1 Iron Ingot.
Archer's Cap : 2 Leather, 2 Leather Strips.
Archer's Cuirass : 4 Leather, 4 Leather Strips, 3 Iron Ingot.
Archer's Gauntlets : 2 Leather, 2 Leather Strips.
[img]http://i.imgur.com/QbKBHed.jpg[/img]
